document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

subSubSection.paragraph: Published data. Iran ( Uhmann 1995a , general distribution; Uhmann 1998 , general distribution; Nardi & Mifsud 2003 , general distribution; Uhmann 2005 , general distribution; Сhandler et al . 2008, checklist; Telnov 2008, general distribution); Tehran (Uhmann 1985); Golestan (Ghahari et al . 2012); Hormozgan ( Bonadona 1970 ; Uhmann 1996 ); Mazandaran (Ghahari et al . 2015).
